name: Infinite Platformer - Bad Edition
description:
The first installment of the Infinite Plaformer series. Made for a summer camp/Unity class thing. I will try? to make more versions, I'm not very good at Unity.

Note:  Don't hold up and space at the same time, you won't be able to stick to the ceiling. You can't use fullscreen because that messes up the UI. This is my first game so it's really bad (hence the name).
